name: Fight for love - cardgame datingsim
description:
We combined card games, dating sim and roguelikes to create the most unique game about love and sex. Date your lover in turn based card combat, have sex in rhythm game boss battles and Fight for love!

Features:
  • Dialog system combined with card game. If you want to succeed in your dates you need to build sentences by setting cards in a line. Like in real date!
  • If your date is successful then you will have sex with that person. Sex segments represented by rhythm game mechanic where player move by streaked positions and fight the boss.
  • In other parts you'll travel through cozy locations - City, bar, cinema, diner and many others!
